title: 27 in. D-Handle Transfer Shovel
description: This Razor-Back transfer shovel is ideal for routine maintenance, such as grading and tramping track. Use this square point track shovel to move gravel, sand and other loose debris and materials. Designed with the professional in mind, this tool’s industrial-gauge solid shank steel blade delivers strength for your tough digging jobs. The shovel’s forward turned-step offers secure foot placement. Its steel and wood D-grip add leverage and control.
